name: FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn

task.description: Adding Registry Entries for FFXIV Launcher
task.name: set_regedit

execute.command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn

echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Config File>

<Cutscene Settings>
CutsceneMovieOpening 1" > "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV.cfg

echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Boot Config File>

<Version>
Browser 1" > "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV_BOOT.cfg

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/SquareEnix/FINAL FANTASY XIV - A Realm Reborn/boot/ffxivboot.exe

content:
files:
- ffxivinstaller: http://gdl.square-enix.com/ffxiv/inst/ffxivsetup_ft.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/SquareEnix/FINAL FANTASY XIV - A Realm Reborn/boot/ffxivboot.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Changing to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Running FFXIV Installer.
    executable: ffxivinstaller
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Adding Registry Entries for FFXIV Launcher
    key: HideWineExports
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\
      FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn
- execute:
    command: echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Config File>\n\n<Cutscene Settings>\nCutsceneMovieOpening
      1" > "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\
      XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV.cfg
- execute:
    command: echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Boot Config File>\n\n<Version>\nBrowser 1"
      > "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\
      -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV_BOOT.cfg
system:
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
